text: Maurizio Vella (born 10 May 1991) is an Italian football player. He plays . He also holds German citizenship. ==Club career== He made his Serie C debut for Juve Stabia on 30 August 2014 in a game against Catanzaro. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Sportspeople from Mannheim Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:S.S.
